title: The Gray Wolf and Other Stories
description: Presents a tale of a student, an old woman and her beautiful, but cursed daughter in the Shetland Islands. This is a selection of short stories from the nineteenth-century innovator of modern fantasy.The gray wolf.--The cruel painter.--The broken swords.--The wow o'Rivven.--Uncle Cornelius, his story.--The butcher's bills.--Birth, dreaming, death
author: George MacDonald
